issue_10.title: S₄×ℤ₂ → SU(2) custodial protection
issue_10.resolution: S₄ 3D rep ⊂ SO(3), so S₄-invariant functions are SO(3)-invariant. Custodial breaking enters only through g' ≠ 0, giving c_T ~ sin²θ_W.

issue_9.title: Multi-scale structure
issue_9.resolution: Λ_QCD and f_π are QCD inputs, not CG outputs. CG uses f_π to set the geometric cutoff Λ = 4πv²/f_π.

issue_6.title: Cutoff scale derivation
issue_6.resolution: Λ = 4πv²/f_π from NJL analogy with effective decay constant f_eff = v²/f_π. Document formula Λ = 4πv√(v/f_π) has error (gives 160 TeV, not 8 TeV).

issue_8.title: χ* mass gap proof
issue_8.resolution: S₄×ℤ₂ representation theory: Higgs is 1⁺ (breathing mode), χ* is 3⁺ (deformation mode). Gap m_χ*/m_h ~ Λ/v ~ 64 is protected by symmetry.

issue_7.title: Wilson coefficient matching
issue_7.resolution: Tree-level matching gives c_H = λ_χ, c_HW = g²g_χ², c_HB = g'²g_χ², c_T = sin²θ_W g_χ², c_□ = g_χ². All match dimensional estimates.
